thread.title: DIANNE
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by DIANNE

author: DIANNE
title: DIANNE
text: I found VERC when we needed to rent a handicap van with little or no notice. This is no easy feat. Only once did I need to give them 24 hour notice. They are very pleasant to deal with. Unfortunately, I wish they were open on Sundays. I come from Providence, RI and it's a haul at times. However, I am grateful for their inventory.
